chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has a problem:

I paid extra for excellent quality and it arrived with a 4 cm high scratch on the screen, dirty sides, and some stains that look like ink. The camera lens appearance is disgusting; it came with a lot of dirt. If I'm paying extra, it's not to receive it in any condition. If you want, it even came packaged in a cardboard box.

Thank you,

Hello ecomobile,

The customer is returning the device for a REFUND. 

The customer has changed her mind about the phone and requested a refund. Thank you for your help! 

Best regards. 
Sarah, Back Market Customer Care

Hola, agente
El vendedor no puede proceder al reenvío debido al siguiente motivo:
El artículo está bloqueado por un código o patrón.
Se ha añadido más información en este mensaje: Dear Backcare,

The phone seems to be locked with a code. Could you inform the customer to provide the code to unlock the phone?

Regards,
AS

Dear ecomobile

Thank you for your confirmation! We appreciate it.

The customer authorized the device to be reset, so please proceed

Given that we cannot provide that information (passwords) due to the privacy policy by our customers, I would like to share with you the following link, where you can find a step by step of how you can factory reset the device.

https://merchant-support.backmarket.com/hc/en-us/articles/4404918550812-Received-an-iPhone-with-a-passcode

Remember that according to the Quality Charter, you can delay the repair process, only if the device it's locked by Find My iPhone, or iCloud.

Otherwise, you must bring the customer a solution within the established deadlines.

Thank you for understanding and in advance for your help.

Regards,
Sarah from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we do not have any available stocks for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
AS
